text: The Seventh Companion () is a 1967 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Aronov and Aleksei German.В Петербурге покажут все фильмы Алексея Германа- старшегоСЕДЬМОЙ СПУТНИК It stars Andrei Popov, Aleksandr Anisimov, and Georgiy Shtil. ==Actors== * Andrei Popov – Eugene Pavlovich Adamov, former royal general * Aleksandr Anisimov – Kuhtin * Georgiy Shtil – Kimka * Pyotr Chernov – Zykov * Valentin Abramov – chairman of the house committee * Vladimir Osenev – Priklonskiy == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1967 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Seventh Companion
